title: Corporate Site
desc: Modern responsive design with animations, videos and images to reflect a professional Mock-up corporate site. features multi-lingual support, LinkedIn Feed, Article Sections, Staff introduction and Contact Area.

title: Gamer Blog Site
desc: Gamer-Oriented blog site with fun and responsive design. Features article pages, store and social media links.

title: Visual Artist Landing Page
desc: Responsive landing page with minimalist design displaying a selection of the artist's work by gallery, with links to social media. This LP is accesed by QR code on the artist's business card, with the goal of allowing potential clients to preview her work.

title: Gaming Site
desc: Gaming site with personally built playable games made in TypeScript. The site features sign-up for users to track their scores, and a responsive design allowing games to be played across devices.
tools: Django, HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, SQLite

title: Fast-Food Mobile Site
desc: Fictional fast-food restaurant mock-up mobile-first site, clean minimalist design with menu items and deals displayed in an easy to navigate layout. Features recruitment page and dynamic shopping cart.

title: Developer Tools Site
desc: A site for developers with 8 personally built tools such as a URL debugger, dummy image creator, and Word to HTML builder. React frontend with a Python and Node.JS backend.
